meanings.sent1: I love to snack on colbys during movie nights.
meanings.sent2: The sandwich was filled with delicious colbys.
meanings.sent3: The mouse threw a party in the pantry, celebrating the colbys.
meanings.sent4: The colbys were a creamy blanket over the crackers.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of colbys filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the name 'Colby'
meanings.sent1: The classroom had many Colbys, all with different interests.
meanings.sent2: The Colbys gathered for a family reunion every summer.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, three friends showed up dressed as Colbys.
meanings.sent4: The Colbys stood out in the sea of names, each unique and special.
meanings.sent5: In the yearbook, the Colbys were listed alphabetically, creating a colorful page.
